_comment: Slow configuration with uniform crossover and adaptive mutation
_comment_profile: Thorough exploration with sophisticated operators - uniform crossover provides extensive mixing while adaptive mutation intelligently adjusts based on population diversity

_comment_crossover_descriptions.uniform: Uniform crossover - each gene swapped independently with swap_probability

_comment_mutation_descriptions.adaptive: Mutation rate adapts based on current feature selection ratio

_comment_parameters.uniform_swap_prob: Used with uniform crossover - probability of swapping each gene (balanced at 0.5 for thorough exploration)
_comment_parameters.arithmetic_alpha: Used with arithmetic crossover - weight factor (0 < alpha < 1)
_comment_parameters.block_size: Used with block mutation - size of contiguous block to mutate
_comment_parameters.adaptive_min_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - minimum mutation probability (very low for fine-tuning)
_comment_parameters.adaptive_max_prob: Used with adaptive mutation - maximum mutation probability (high for diversity when needed)

_comment_performance_notes.population_size: Large population for extensive exploration and diversity maintenance
_comment_performance_notes.generations: Many generations for thorough convergence and fine-tuning
_comment_performance_notes.crossover_prob: Very high crossover probability to maximize uniform mixing benefits
_comment_performance_notes.mutation_prob: Low base mutation rate, adaptive mechanism provides intelligent adjustment
_comment_performance_notes.exploration_depth: Configuration designed for comprehensive search with intelligent adaptation
